meanings.sent1: The ground felt quakiest during the earthquake.
meanings.sent2: She held onto the quakiest part of the building during the tremor.
meanings.sent3: The quakiest spot in the room was under the shaky table.
meanings.sent4: His voice was the quakiest as he tried to remain calm.
meanings.sent5: The quakiest sensation ran through her body as the train passed by.

meanings.definition: Most prone to quaking or trembling.
meanings.sent1: The small dog was the quakiest during thunderstorms.
meanings.sent2: The quakiest leaves fell from the tree in the wind.
meanings.sent3: She felt the quakiest when standing on the wobbly bridge.
meanings.sent4: The quakiest ground shook beneath their feet.
meanings.sent5: His hands were the quakiest as he held the delicate glass figurine.
